dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: OH MY GOSH, you are NOT going to believe this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: O H M Y G O S H, you are N O T going to believe this!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, what now? Another metaverse announcement? Please tell me it's not another crypto thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, what now? Another metaverse announcement? Please tell me it's not another crypto thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, seriously. Kaspi.kz, you know, the big Kazakhstani Super App? They’ve like, partnered with Alipay+!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, seriously. the website, you know, the big Kazakhstani Super App? They've like, partnered with Alipay+!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joint Stock Company Kaspi.kz (Kaspi.kz) (Nasdaq: KSPI), which operates the Kaspi.kz Super App for consumers and Kaspi Pay Super App for merchants, today announces a new partnership with Alipay + to enable Kaspi.kz customers to pay using the Kaspi.kz Super App and QR code, throughout China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And? So, what, people can pay for their kumis with a QR code? Yawn.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And? So, what, people can pay for their kumis with a Q R code? Yawn.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but listen! Kazakhstani tourists can now pay with their Kaspi.kz app in China. Like, everywhere. No cash, no cards, just QR.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but listen! Kazakhstani tourists can now pay with their the website app in China. Like, everywhere. No cash, no cards, just Q R.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When travelling in China, Kazakhstanis no longer need to take cash or a card with them. Now, using the Kaspi.kz Super App, purchases in Chinese stores, cafes, taxis and more than 80 million points throughout China can be paid for by QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, okay. For... Kazakhstani tourists. That's, um, a super niche market, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, okay. For... Kazakhstani tourists. That's, um, a super niche market, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's huge! Like, 80 million points across China. Stores, taxis, cafes. Think about the convenience for travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's huge! Like, eighty million points across China. Stores, taxis, cafes. Think about the convenience for travelers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, using the Kaspi.kz Super App, purchases in Chinese stores, cafes, taxis and more than 80 million points throughout China can be paid for by QR code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Convenient for them, I guess. But for the rest of us, it’s just another app integrating with another app, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Convenient for them, I guess. But for the rest of us, it's just another app integrating with another app, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's about, uh, seamless financial experiences abroad. And they're saying it'll boost purchasing power by 15% in the first year! That's, like, real economic impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's about, uh, seamless financial experiences abroad. And they're saying it'll boost purchasing power by fifteen percent in the first year! That's, like, real economic impact.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fifteen percent, huh? Sounds like, um, corporate speak for 'we hope.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifteen percent, huh? Sounds like, um, corporate speak for 'we hope.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it helps the Kazakhstani economy too, with remittances coming home. It’s not just a payment, it’s about, uh, connection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it helps the Kazakhstani economy too, with remittances coming home. It's not just a payment, it's about, uh, connection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. Connecting people through… QR codes. Groundbreaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah. Connecting people through... Q R codes. Groundbreaking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They even mentioned EU data protection, so it's all secure. And this is part of Kaspi.kz's international expansion, they just listed on Nasdaq. This is, uh, a really big deal for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They even mentioned E U data protection, so it's all secure. And this is part of the website 's international expansion, they just listed on Nasdaq. This is, uh, a really big deal for them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sure, for them. Another big tech company getting bigger, yay.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sure, for them. Another big tech company getting bigger, yay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But for people actually traveling, it's a huge simplification. Imagine not having to worry about local currency!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But for people actually traveling, it's a huge simplification. Imagine not having to worry about local currency!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I can imagine. It’s just, you know, for some people. Not exactly solving world hunger, is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I can imagine. It's just, you know, for some people. Not exactly solving world hunger, is it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, maybe not saving the world, but it's making their world a lot easier, like, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, maybe not saving the world, but it's making their world a lot easier, like, don't you think?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fine, whatever. If it makes some tourists happy, good for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fine, whatever. If it makes some tourists happy, good for them.
